divs: Sighting DetailsTHIS OBJECT WAS FIRST NOTICED BY MYSELF IN NIGHT SKY @ 8:51 PM CENTRAL TIME GOING FROM WEST TO EAST ALL THE WAY ACROSS THE SKY FROM HORIZON TO HORIZON IN ABOUT A MIN. VERY FAINT HAD TO LOOK AWAY FROM IT TO SEE IT WITH PERIPHREAL VISION IT WAS SO HIGH UP. NO BLINKING LIGHTS. ABOUT 5 MIN. LATER SAW IT GO BACK FROM EAST TO WEST IN SAME LINE IT TRAVELED PREVIOUSLY FROM WEST TO EAST. DIDNT SEE IT FOR ABOUT 10 MORE MIN. THEN FOUND IT AGAIN GOING EAST TO WEST AGAIN BETWEEN THE SAME STARS. I HAVE NEVER WITNESSED ANYTHING LIKE THIS BEFORE & IT REALLY FREAKED ME OUT. I KNOW THIS WAS NOT A PLANE IT WAS SO FAR UP IN THE SKY. I COULD SEE THE STARS BRIGHTER THAN THIS OBJECT. I AM GOING TO BE WATCHING AGAIN TONIGHT. THIS THING WAS FAST & IT WAS ALMOST LIKE IT WAS FLYING IN A GRID LOOKING FOR SOMETHING. NO BLINKING LIGHTS AT ALL JUST A FAINT RED LIGHT. I FINALLY DONT HAVE TO BELEIVE SOMEONE ELSE IVE SEEN IT WITH MY OWN EYES!!!!
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Pell City
There were no other sightings in Pell City on or around May 3rd 2009
Summary: Red object from west to east & east to west back & forth.
